sentences: Kutsikas on kahe ja poole nädalane.
context: The word 'nädalaid' is the genitive plural form of 'nädal', meaning 'week'. In this context, it appears to be part of compound words or phrases related to duration. For example, in 'kahe ja poole nädalane', it means 'two and a half weeks old'; in 'nädalaselt' it means 'from/after a week'; and in 'nädalane koormus' it means 'week-long workload'. The word indicates duration related to weeks, whether describing age of something/someone, time elapsed, or periodic activities.
